definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: You are only being examined on this semester's work.
sentences.chinese: 現在只考你在本學期學的課程。

sentences.english: Babies tumble when they are learning to walk.
sentences.chinese: 幼兒在學走路時常常跌倒。

sentences.english: However some grownup parents never figure out how to talk to a child.
sentences.chinese: 然而，許多家長怎麼也學不會正確地和孩子交談。

sentences.english: In this paper , the structure of macromaterialogy is discussed and the branching of technological sciences is considered.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論宏觀材料學的結構，並思考技術科學的分支。

sentences.english: We’re learning about the fermentation process.
sentences.chinese: 目前我們在學發酵過程。

sentences.english: An application of data mining in the research of TCM syndrome theories.
sentences.chinese: 數據挖掘技術在中醫證候學研究中的應用。

sentences.english: Suzhou learn English where? World international English your best choice.
sentences.chinese: 蘇州學英語哪裏去？沃爾得國際英語你的最好選擇。

sentences.english: He enjoys pretending to be you, Sergeant.
sentences.chinese: 警官，他崇拜你，很喜歡學你。

sentences.english: Wasn't it quite tough to get into that course in UCLA?
sentences.chinese: 能進到UCLA學這門課很難吧？

sentences.english: To learn to type, seldom at ordinary times used phoneticize also was collected rise.
sentences.chinese: 爲了學打字，平時不常用的拼音也撿了起來。

sentences.english: Did you take statistics at college?
sentences.chinese: 你上大學時學統計學了嗎？

sentences.english: In the knowledge that learned during school can say basically otiose .
sentences.chinese: 在校期間學了的知識，可以說基本上沒有用的。

sentences.english: "Piano lessons, " I tell Kevin. "Same as last year. "
sentences.chinese: “學鋼琴”，我報告凱文，“和客歲同樣”。

sentences.english: But it’s hard, a bit like learning to sing by watching MTV.
sentences.chinese: 但這很困難，有點類似於跟着MTV學唱歌。

sentences.english: Lesson Thirty-seven How could a beautiful girl learn Monkey Boxing?
sentences.chinese: 第三十七課哪兒有漂亮姑娘學猴拳的？

sentences.english: She was busy (in) learning computer then.
sentences.chinese: 她那時正在忙於學電腦。
